description: I have been practicing and teaching deep bodywork worldwide for more than 35 years. I have created this course to specifically teach you how to treat, and alleviate the most common of the chronic pain syndromes. Back and lower back pain. This is a comprehensive teaching suitable for beginners, experienced body-workers and massage therapists. The course offers clear instruction, Graphics and precise techniques which will enable you to work with assurance and will instill confidence in you enabling you to treat your clients or friends suffering from painful back and lower back pain. This Instruction is fun and easy to learn.
title: Myofascial Trainings - Back Pain
